overview: Bibi is a love story between two girls, a trapeze artist and an anarchist, developed in Athens during the current economic crisis. In their daily lives are being reflected the consequences of this crisis, that could unfold nowadays throughout all countries of southern Europe. Evictions, debts, demonstrations, riots, repression and the rise of the extreme right- parties... But - will there be some space for the world's most beautiful feeling in a place like this?
title: Bibi
